sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { useEffect } from 'react' import { searchPokemonsById } from '../store/actions' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' export default function Details(props) { let details = useSelector((state) => state.details) var num = props.id let dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(() => { dispatch(searchPokemonsById(num)) }, [dispatch]) console.log(details) return (

{details[0].name.toUpperCase()}

ID: {details[0].id}#

Defense: {details[0].defense}

Attack: {details[0].attack}

Height: {details[0].height}

Weight: {details[0].weight}

Speed: {details[0].speed}

Type: {details[0].type[0].toUpperCase()} , {details[0].type[1].toUpperCase()}

) }
